attributes.action: give minimum wage to all mp's.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I woould like to see all mp's and the pm given minimum wage instead of the massize wages the recieve at the moment. With this pay cut they might see how better to run the country for the benifit of the majority of the people instead of the few.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
